policy.Name: AllUsersMemberOfRole
policy.Description: Description: Ensures that all users are a member of a role
policy.Reason: Reason: Better control of user data access if only allowed via views or stored procedures

policy.Name: NoSqlLogins
policy.Description: Description: Policy ensures that no login apart from sa is a SQL login
policy.Reason: Reason: Want all user managed via ADS/windows

policy.Name: NoUserPermissions
policy.Description: Description: Policy ensures that no user is granted direct permissions to any of the base tables in the database
policy.Reason: Reason: Make sure all users are members of a db role
